entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Coaticook
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain beginning late in the afternoon except snow over northern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low plus 1 with temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain except snow over northern sections in the evening. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm over northern sections. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low plus 1 with temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
